Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: gotools fails to build from the fabric
Issue.description: golint 11:22:29 package github.com/golang/lint/golint: code in directory /opt/gotools/obj/src/github.com/golang/lint/golint expects import "golang.org/x/lint/golint" 11:22:29 make 1 : *** gotool.golint Error 1 11:22:29 make: *** /opt/gotools/bin/golint Error 2 11:22:29 gotools.mk:53: recipe for target 'gotool.golint' failed {code} *Build Logs* https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/job/fabric-ca-merge-end-2-end-x86_64/143/console >
